thig2.3:1.3_0: My pestle’s shameless wind was wafting;
thig2.3:1.4_0: my little pot wafted like an eel.
thig2.3:2.1_0: Now, as for greed and hate:
thig2.3:2.2_0: I sear them and sizzle them up.
thig2.3:2.3_0: Having gone to the root of a tree,
thig2.3:2.4_0: I meditate happily, thinking, “Oh, what bliss!”
